item.title: 印度股票在 10 个月内吸引了 700 亿美元的本地投资者
item.description: 今年前 10 个月，印度投资者向本地股票投入了 700 多亿美元，在全球基金纷纷撤离之际，印度股票流入量有望创下年度纪录。【原文：Indian investors have poured more than $70 billion into local stocks in the first 10 months of the year, putting inflows on track to reach an annual record just as global funds are exiting.】

item.title: 长江基建在泰晤士河水务谈判中 "研究所有机会
item.description: 长江基建控股有限公司（CK Infrastructure Holdings Ltd.）在回应最近有关其有意投资英国最大的供水和污水处理运营商泰晤士水务公司（Thames Water）的新闻报道时表示，该公司正在研究所有对公司及其股东有利的机会。【原文：CK Infrastructure Holdings Ltd. said it’s studying all opportunities that are beneficial to the company and its shareholders, in a response to recent news reports about its interest in investing in Thames Water, the UK’s largest water and sewage operator.】

item.title: 滨海湾金沙向银行申请创纪录的 120 亿新元贷款
item.description: 滨海湾金沙私人有限公司（Marina Bay Sands Pte）正在寻求高达 120 亿新元（89 亿美元）的贷款，以资助其新加坡赌场度假村的扩建计划。【原文：Marina Bay Sands Pte is marketing a loan of as much as S$12 billion ($8.9 billion) as it seeks to fund a planned expansion of its casino resort in Singapore.】

item.title: 日本总统石破茂再次施压要求企业提高薪酬
item.description: 日本首相石破茂呼吁企业继续提高工人工资，因为日本政府正努力确保稳定的通货膨胀和经济增长，同时应对不断上涨的生活成本。【原文：Japanese Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba called on companies to continue ramping up pay for workers, as his government seeks to secure stable inflation and economic growth while also responding to the rising cost of living.】

item.title: 似曾相识 "的特朗普关税重演令市场交易员震惊不已
item.description: 当唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）最新关税威胁的头条新闻导致他的手机被电话打爆时，尼克-特维戴尔（Nick Twidale）把一杯纯白咖啡洒在了键盘上。【原文：Nick Twidale spilled a flat white coffee on his keyboard when headlines on Donald Trump‘s latest tariff threats caused his phone to blow up with calls.】

item.title: 拜聚公司面临新的财务和会计行为调查
item.description: 据知情人士透露，印度已开始对 Byju's 的融资和会计做法进行调查，此前的一次检查发现这家陷入困境的在线辅导公司存在公司治理漏洞。【原文：India has started an investigation into financing and accounting practices at Byju’s, according to people with knowledge of the matter, after a previous inspection found corporate governance lapses at the struggling online tutoring firm.】

item.title: 斯里兰卡将违约美元债务换成新债券
item.description: 斯里兰卡将向违约美元债券的持有者发行新票据，因为这个南亚国家越来越接近完成其 430 亿美元外债的重组。【原文：Sri Lanka will issue new notes to holders of its defaulted dollar bonds, as the South Asian nation draws closer to completing the restructuring of its $43 billion of foreign debt.】

item.title: 日本火箭在测试中起火，太空计划遭受重创
item.description: 日本轻型火箭周二起火，第二次试运行失败，这是日本太空计划遭遇的最新挫折。【原文：Japan’s lightweight rocket failed its second test run after catching fire Tuesday in the latest setback for the country’s space program.】

item.title: 精神航空破产对美国假日旅游的影响
item.description: 美国精神航空公司（Spirit Airlines Inc.）于 11 月 18 日申请破产保护，成为众多屈服于财务压力的美国航空公司之一。该公司在美国一年中最繁忙的旅行期到来之前申请破产保护，引发了机票持有者对能否在感恩节假期到达目的地的焦虑。【原文：Spirit Airlines Inc. joined a lengthy list of US carriers to succumb to financial pressure when it filed for bankruptcy protection Nov. 18. In doing so just before the busiest travel stretch of the year in the US, the company generated anxiety among ticket holders about whether they’d make it to their destinations for the Thanksgiving holiday.】

item.title: 新加坡商人因诈骗 11 亿美元镍矿面临审判
item.description: 一名前会计师被指控经营了一起震惊新加坡商界的数十亿美元的镍矿诈骗案，他将于周二受审，他将被控 100 多项与欺诈和洗钱有关的罪名。【原文：An ex-accountant accused of running a billion-dollar nickel scam that rocked Singapore’s business community is on trial on Tuesday on more than 100 charges related to fraud and money laundering.】

item.title: 小米准备推出自己的移动芯片，向联发科和高通施压
item.description: 小米公司正在为其即将推出的智能手机准备一款自主设计的移动处理器，以减少对外国供应商高通公司和联发科公司的依赖。【原文：Xiaomi Corp. is preparing a self-designed mobile processor for its upcoming smartphones in an effort to reduce its reliance on foreign suppliers Qualcomm Inc. and MediaTek Inc.】

item.title: 通胀重燃，尼日利亚将延长加息周期：日间指南
item.description: 尼日利亚央行行长们在第三季度经济增长强于预期的鼓舞下，将延长其两年多的紧缩周期，以抑制通货膨胀。【原文：Nigerian central bankers, emboldened by stronger-than-expected third quarter economic growth, are set to extend their more than two-year tightening cycle to temper inflation.】

item.title: ABB 首席执行官警告：欧洲可能因能源成本问题失去更多工作机会
item.description: ABB公司首席执行官莫滕-维罗德（Morten Wierod）说，如果欧洲不能减少繁文缛节和能源成本，就有可能将投资和工业就业机会流失到美国等国家。首席执行官莫滕-维罗德（Morten Wierod）说。【原文：Europe risks losing investments and industrial jobs to countries including the US if the region fails to cut red tape and energy costs, said ABB Ltd. Chief Executive Officer Morten Wierod.】

item.title: 亚洲外汇、中国股市将受到特朗普关税的冲击：分析师
item.description: 美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普宣布将对墨西哥和加拿大征收贸易税，并对中国提高关税，交易员们正在重新评估自己的仓位，市场可能会继续承压。【原文：Markets are likely to remain pressured as traders reassess their positions after President-elect Donald Trump announced he would impose trade levies on Mexico, Canada, and increase tariffs on China.】

item.title: 淡季来临，中国钢铁产量仍将提升铁矿石产量
item.description: 铁矿石价格本周反弹，原因是中国钢厂在淡季开始时生产的金属量超过往常。【原文：Iron ore prices have rallied this week as Chinese steel mills churn out more metal than usual at the beginning of the low season.】

item.title: 印度中央银行行长住院，即将出院
item.description: 印度央行行长沙克提坎塔-达斯（Shaktikanta Das）在南部城市钦奈住院治疗，预计将很快出院。【原文：India’s central bank Governor Shaktikanta Das was hospitalized in the southern city of Chennai and is expected to be released soon.】

item.title: 惠誉警告阿达尼港口公司的美元债券可能被降至 "垃圾 "级
item.description: 惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）周二表示，在美国检察官对阿达尼集团（Adani Group）高管涉嫌贿赂提出指控后，该集团港口业务的美元债券可能被下调至投机级。【原文：Dollar bonds of Adani Group’s ports business may be cut to speculative grade after US prosecutors brought charges of alleged bribery against executives of the conglomerate, Fitch Ratings said Tuesday.】

item.title: 特朗普卷土重来，中国为人民币划定红线
item.description: 随着中国收紧对人民币的控制，人民币开始面临美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）新的关税威胁。【原文：A line in the sand is starting to emerge for the yuan, as China tightens its grip on a currency that is facing fresh tariff threats from US President-elect Donald Trump.】

item.title: Pemex 将与财政部合作制定供应商债务计划
item.description: 据墨西哥石油公司首席执行官的讲话录音显示，墨西哥财政部正准备争取一个银行财团提供融资，墨西哥石油公司将用这笔资金偿还与服务供应商的债务。【原文：Mexico’s finance ministry is preparing to enlist a consortium of banks to provide financing that Petroleos Mexicanos would use to pay off debt with service providers, according to a recording of remarks made by its CEO.】

item.title: 特朗普回归，中国抢购巴西廉价大豆
item.description: 中国买家正在大量采购即将收获的巴西大豆，以利用具有吸引力的价格，在对与美国贸易紧张关系恶化的担忧高涨之际，此举也将有助于保障供应。【原文：Chinese buyers are loading up on Brazilian soybeans from the coming harvest, taking advantage of attractive prices in a move that will also help safeguard supply, at a time when concerns about worsening trade tensions with the US are running high.】

item.title: 特朗普威胁征收更多关税后美元大涨，铜价下滑
item.description: 美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普誓言征收额外关税后，美元走强，铜和其他基本金属周二回落。【原文：Copper and other base metals retreated Tuesday as the dollar strengthened after US President-elect Donald Trump vowed additional tariffs.】

item.title: 日本企业以 1992 年以来最快速度向客户转嫁成本
item.description: 日本央行的数据显示，日本企业正以 32 年来最快的速度将不断上涨的劳动力成本以提高服务价格的形式转嫁给商业客户，这为提高基准利率提供了支持。【原文：Japanese companies are passing on rising labor costs to business customers in the form of higher service prices at the fastest pace in 32 years, according to Bank of Japan data that support the case for raising the benchmark interest rate.】

item.title: StanChart 是印度枢纽美元结算银行的领跑者
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，渣打银行已成为印度最新金融中心实时美元交易结算银行的领跑者。【原文：Standard Chartered Plc has emerged as the front-runner to become the settlement bank for real-time dollar-denominated trades in India’s newest financial hub, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 日本储蓄银行效仿野村证券披露阿达尼基金风险敞口
item.description: 随着印度企业集团阿达尼集团丑闻的余波扩散，SBI 控股公司与野村控股公司和其他日本金融公司一起公布了其共同基金持有阿达尼集团公司证券的详细情况。【原文：SBI Holdings Inc. has joined Nomura Holdings Inc. and other Japanese financial firms in releasing details of their mutual funds’ exposure to securities in the Adani Group companies, as fallout spreads from the Indian conglomerate’s scandal.】
